comments_since_last_sample.body: another possible solution to the payment issue is to implement a system that only unlocks inventory once  someone has paid in the barrel
How about: "Buy 2 stacks, get 3rd stack of the same item type free with Octagon Coupon!"

You should consider using your unlimited supply of shoulder boxes to sell other items. I'd say every trip to the octagon includes a free shulker. You will find sales increase across all your products this way. It also allows you to charge a higher price on all ur item's.

i think u should make some craters around the octagon legs - cuz that thing looks massive and heavy - so it makes sense that it will create craters as it stands 
also maybe thicker legs :)

The problem is that they don't see the barrel because of the item frames with the Diamond and Derpcoin items on them (as crazy as that may seem, just watch Keralis' video to see how confused he is on where to pay especially when he sees payment in the shulkers as well)
